features: [All In One Design] Selfie stick &phone tripod, all retract in one piece, This portable tripod is easy for storage and travel.

[Stable & More Large Tripod Base] This compact phone tripod has a 10.2'' tripod base with three non-slip silicone pads on the feet, which could make this selfie stick with remote more stable and firm when it is used as a tripod.
[ 360° Rotation Design] This YuanRuiLin monopod‘s head can be rotated 360° and 180° left & right. This newly-released long tripod fits any iOS or Android phones.

[Multifunctional Selfie Tripod] This foldable tripod can be matched with Phone. The adjustable tripod, and you can lock it to the desired length as needed to achieve perfect shooting. This makes it possible to use it as a foldable tabletop tripod or stand it on the floor.
[What You Get] One Selfie Stick Tripod with Detachable Remote, One Storage Bag, User Manual, One USB charging cable our friendly customer service.
body.description: What benefits you will get One-piece Design, More Portable This Bluetooth selfie stick tripod features the one-piece design, without bothering to install the product piece by piece. The product pretty convenient and portable to be put in your bags iOS/Android Compatible It matches most iOS 5.1 and above /Android 5.0 and above phones, so you do not need to worry about the connection issue ! The remote control is rechargeable You won't have to worry about changing batteries

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: All In One Design Selfie Stick Tripod Photograph the perfect moment with this selfie stick tripod with remote This cellphone tripod aid you to catch the best moment of you life with your families and friends. ULCLAYRUS selfie stick is designed with easy telescoping, allowing you to hold in hand with comfortable grip, carry around for traveling and store it conveniently.

Widely Compatibility Selfie Tripod For Iphone and Andriod Extend Phone Size The size of the phone holder can be adjusted in the range of 1.97-3.46inch. Suitable for 4-7" mobile phones. The inner side of the arm is equipped with a silicone pad to protect the mobile phone from scratches during installation.

What benefits you will get One-piece Design, More Portable This Bluetooth selfie stick tripod features the one-piece design, without bothering to install the product piece by piece. The product pretty convenient and portable to be put in your bags iOS/Android Compatible It matches most iOS 5.1 and above /Android 5.0 and above phones, so you do not need to worry about the connection issue ! The remote control is rechargeable You won't have to worry about changing batteries Material: Aluminum Alloy Battery Type: Rechargeable Lithium battery Stretchable Length: 60 inches Fold Length: 11.4 inches Bluetooth Compatibility: iOS 7.0, Android 5.0 and above Maximum Load: 1KG

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and packable
reviews.reviewText: Impressed with the thought that went into its simple design compact size and quality! Expands and contracts to about 60 inches or 5 feet. Tripod legs come out and Bluetooth enabled with a detachable remote. The remote control battery is a rechargeable battery and does not need to be replaced. If you do not understand the circuit, it is not recommended to replace it yourself. But there are small remotes for wireless phones that can replace non functioning tripod remote

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel companion
reviews.reviewText: Just got off a solo cruise and this was amazing to have. It folds up small and easily fits into my small bag. I could head off the beaten path to find the best spots for some panoramic shots without having to worry about anyone being around to take my photo for me. In the past I’d have to find something to prop my camera against, but with this, I can go anywhere and get any shot I want. I’m going on an international trip soon, and am already excited to take it with me. The remote worked flawlessly. It held charge really well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A little bulky but thats definitely offset by it's functionality. Would definitely buy again or as a gift. Great height control, great stability and remote control works flawlessly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A nice tripod. Works fine
reviews.reviewText: I’ve taken in several trips and actually use it - that’s the best recommendation of all - I use it. B/T works well, it’s a bit heavy but sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Selfie Stick
reviews.reviewText: I tried to research all the selfie sticks before I purchased this one, my efforts paid off. This stick is well made, solid built aluminum and plastic parts. It’s very stable as a tripod, lightweight but rigid when extended as a selfie stick and holds my iPhone 12 tightly. It collapses down easily, is less than a foot long collapsed and looks great. The rechargeable camera remote works well, I couldn’t be happier!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Sleek and Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This is the best camera stick/tripod I have ever purchased it's easy to use and looks so sleek. I love how it tilts vertically and horizontally. The holder is very sturdy and won't "pop" on you. I may make this a Stocking stuffer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Excellent value for the price, compact size tripod and sturdy Selfie Stick!This is an excellent product for anyone looking for a compact selfie stick that is sturdier, extends to a 60inch length, and comfortable grip. There is an extremely convenient and detachable Bluetooth remote control that is rechargeable and USB to micro-USB cable provided as part of the contents. The tripod itself is extremely useful for use as a selfie or a phone tripod enthusiast to use a steady, yet light in weight tripod. The holder for placing the phone has quite a lot of tension, so provides a very secure grip to hold a phone, with some padding to not scratch the phone and avoid any slip/slide of phone once secured. A great product and I'm extremely satisfied with the purchase, delivered on time by Amazon as always.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the trick
reviews.reviewText: Works well. It has been helpful. I carry it in my backpack every day. I would order it again.
